company_legal_names: astha infra engg i pvt. ltd.
short_description: astha infra engg is a heavy construction equipment supplier based in india.
long_description: we established in 2002 as engineering procurement & construction company in the field of material handling and chemical processing equipment. ltd has contributed significantly in the growth of infrastructure in the country over the last eleven year and continues to provide solutions in the field of civil and mechanical engineering. the company is credited with pioneering the art of integrating engineering and innovation with construction practices to maximize benefits to society at large. astha infra engg (india) pvt ltd is an iso certified company specializing in the tank jacking equipment for welded tanks and steel bolted tanks. we are the specialist in the construction of all kind of storage device like clinker silo, cement silo, fly ash silo, over-head water tank and bridge pier through slip forming system. we are the pioneer in the field of slip form technology and working with the leading companies. we also manufacture and export customized engineering products for api storage tanks with dome roof tanks, floating roof tanks, fixed roof tanks.

generated_description: astha infra engg, legally known as astha infra engg india pvt ltd., based in navi mumbai, maharashtra, is a leading manufacturer and exporter of hydraulic jacking systems and equipment for tank erection. established in 2002, the company specializes in the production of hydraulic jacks, jack-up systems, and retractable jacking systems for above-ground storage tanks. they also supply stack car parking systems, eot cranes, and various slipform systems for industrial chimneys and cement silos. astha infra engg serves a global market, providing solutions that significantly reduce construction time and costs while enhancing safety and efficiency.
